Name: Battle Armor
Details: Battle armor, sometimes called battlesuits or Tactical Armor, are armored infantry. Alongside the lighter power armor variety, battle armor is designed to increase the effectiveness of infantry, offering improved resilence, atmospheric containment and firepower at the cost of ... well, cost. Battle armor are typically deployed in squads of four by the Inner Sphere and Periphery, stars of five by the Clans, and ComStar and Word of Blake Level Is see six suits deployed.
